name: Pukul Bola (Pong)
description:
Project practice from game programming lectures. Note: Can only be played with the keyboard on a PC or laptop. Check the source code at here.

Keyboard:

  • Player 1 : W and S
  • Player 2 : ArrowUp and ArrowDown

External Source:

  • Press Start 2P (Font)
  • Glass and Metal Collision (SFX)
  • Chiptune Shopping Adventures (BGM)
  • How Now Brown Cow? (BGM)
